businessProfile.name: Convivio Italian Artisan Cuisine - Zionsville
businessProfile.address: 40 S Main St, Zionsville, IN 46077, USA

reviews.text: Fantastic service and unbelievably tasty food. The owner came over and talked to us for a little bit about his restaurant and different dishes that he‚Äôs created. It was fantastic ambience, and not too loud, either. The setting is beautiful, and the food cannot be overstated! I really like the rigatoni. Five star for everything! I will be back and ordering this exact dish again!

We came for a very early dinner so it was a bit quiet when we got here. But the dinner rush soon picked up and so did the atmosphere! We sat at the bar and had absolutely wonderful service from Chris, who provided great conversation and even better food/drink recommendations. The scratch pasta was so good and can‚Äôt wait to come back!

We were served with there in house bread and olive oil dipping sauce which was amazing. The Margarita pizza was amazing and my dish with ribbon pasta in a lobster stock sauce and serval different seafood clams calamari shrimp and baby scallops. This by far was the best pasta dish I have ever eaten.
To fish with dessert pistachio gelato

My daughter earned straight As on her report card and was able to select where we ate for dinner.  She selected Convivio - good choice.  I had been here one other time with a work event.  Then we had 16+ people, the crew did great, the atmosphere was great for a work event and all went smoothly.

This time, we were with just my family of 4.  And again, the crew did great, the atmosphere was great for a straight A celebration and all went smoothly.

Both times the food was cooked perfectly and the presentation was art work.  I want to go back to try more things!  Big group, small group - this is a fine place to be....

Pasta is always great at this place! I had the pasta with lamb and it was delicious! They have a very big selection of wines! And servers always have the best recommendations. For dessert had the chocolate cake and it was awesome!

editorial_summary.overview: Classic pasta dishes & Italian entrees are the draw at this informal eatery with a rooftop patio.

recentReviews.text: If you are looking for great Italian food and service and ambiance to boot look no further.
Always delicious and always exceptional service. Loved the new menu, the amazing special, our charming waitress and over-the-top desserts.
This is our favorite Convivio location. Our server Sam was great; always showed up at the right time. The lamb w/ goat cheese ravioli was outstanding as was the prosciutto and arugula pizza.

Hands down, my wife and I's favorite restaurant for date night. We've eaten at all the upscale steak houses and trendy spots downtown, but nothing comes close to a piping hot plate of in house made pasta they are serving up at Convivio. Every dish taste like a warm hug. I know I am being dramatic...but it really is that good.

We were served with there in house bread and olive oil dipping sauce which was amazing. The Margarita pizza was amazing and my dish with ribbon pasta in a lobster stock sauce and serval different seafood clams calamari shrimp and baby scallops. This by far was the best pasta dish I have ever eaten.
To fish with dessert pistachio gelato

This place was generally nice but there was some room to improve.

1. My veal Marsala was cold. It was clearly prepped too early and not brought out on time. Other than the mushrooms on top, it was also very bland. Overall, it was a very disappointing dish and poorly delivered. Seems unacceptable for a place like this for the main dish to be so poorly done.
2. Our waitress was stretched thin or not good. We had to ask another server to get her attention twice as she just wasn't stopping by or even looking our way. Our food was delivered at weird stages even though we had made it pretty obvious which appetizer was to be a main dish for us. Combined with the I'll timed and prepared veal, I am wondering if our server was the problem all along.

Overall, a decent experience with some disappointments. I'd still give them another chance since some of the food was still very good.

detailedReviews.author: Jeffrey Yates
detailedReviews.text: If you are looking for great Italian food and service and ambiance to boot look no further.

detailedReviews.author: Beth Miller
detailedReviews.text: Always delicious and always exceptional service. Loved the new menu, the amazing special, our charming waitress and over-the-top desserts.

detailedReviews.author: Ron Fitzpatrick
detailedReviews.text: This is our favorite Convivio location. Our server Sam was great; always showed up at the right time. The lamb w/ goat cheese ravioli was outstanding as was the prosciutto and arugula pizza.

detailedReviews.author: Sean Smith
detailedReviews.text: Hands down, my wife and I's favorite restaurant for date night. We've eaten at all the upscale steak houses and trendy spots downtown, but nothing comes close to a piping hot plate of in house made pasta they are serving up at Convivio. Every dish taste like a warm hug. I know I am being dramatic...but it really is that good.

detailedReviews.author: Lisa Jasek
detailedReviews.text:
We were served with there in house bread and olive oil dipping sauce which was amazing. The Margarita pizza was amazing and my dish with ribbon pasta in a lobster stock sauce and serval different seafood clams calamari shrimp and baby scallops. This by far was the best pasta dish I have ever eaten.
To fish with dessert pistachio gelato

detailedReviews.author: Julie Greenlee
detailedReviews.text: Tim is the best waiter!

detailedReviews.author: Tolga Ercan
detailedReviews.text:
This place was generally nice but there was some room to improve.

1. My veal Marsala was cold. It was clearly prepped too early and not brought out on time. Other than the mushrooms on top, it was also very bland. Overall, it was a very disappointing dish and poorly delivered. Seems unacceptable for a place like this for the main dish to be so poorly done.
2. Our waitress was stretched thin or not good. We had to ask another server to get her attention twice as she just wasn't stopping by or even looking our way. Our food was delivered at weird stages even though we had made it pretty obvious which appetizer was to be a main dish for us. Combined with the I'll timed and prepared veal, I am wondering if our server was the problem all along.

Overall, a decent experience with some disappointments. I'd still give them another chance since some of the food was still very good.

detailedReviews.author: Christa K
detailedReviews.text: Everything we ate was delicious.

detailedReviews.author: Boyd Haley
detailedReviews.text: This is my wife and I date spot! We love the rotating menu that highlights Italian regions!

detailedReviews.author: Loriann Long
detailedReviews.text: We visited this lovely restaurant last night, our service, provided by Ms. Isabella was outstanding!!! Every part of our meal, starter, entree, and dessert was absolutely amazing! Definitely adding to our date night spot !

detailedReviews.author: Costantine Albany
detailedReviews.text: Outstanding restaurant with amazing atmosphere, freshly made Italian food, and great service.

detailedReviews.author: Crista Wilkins
detailedReviews.text: When you stick to basics, this place is fantastic.

detailedReviews.author: Melanie Gumma
detailedReviews.text: We came for a very early dinner so it was a bit quiet when we got here. But the dinner rush soon picked up and so did the atmosphere! We sat at the bar and had absolutely wonderful service from Chris, who provided great conversation and even better food/drink recommendations. The scratch pasta was so good and can‚Äôt wait to come back!

detailedReviews.author: Carole Reeves
detailedReviews.text: Food was delicious!!!  Love your pasta dishes.  The rabbit papperadella was great and our all time favorite rigatoni with mushrooms and sausage always wonderful!

detailedReviews.author: Renato Souza
detailedReviews.text:
We had an amazing evening at Convivio. From the moment we walked in, the atmosphere was warm and inviting, as the place is newly decorated with tasteful lighting and smooth background music that set the tone for a relaxed dinner.

The food was outstanding. We started with the ‚Äúbruschetta rossa‚Äù, which was a perfect combination of toasted fresh bread, just the right hint of garlic, fresh tomatoes, basil, and mozzarella. It was simple, fresh, and delicious. For the main course, we had the ‚Äúgnocchi al funghi‚Äù and the  ‚Äúrigatoni‚Äù. Both pasta dishes were flawlessly prepared and full of flavor. The wine selection was another highlight, offering flexibility with 6oz, 9oz, or full bottle options at very good price.

But what truly elevated the experience was the service. Our server, Sam H, was exceptional. He took the time to explain the menu in a helpful, approachable way and genuinely connected with us, asking where we were from and what brought us to Indy. It wasn‚Äôt just great service, it was hospitality at its finest. We felt truly welcome, not just as customers but as guests. Please, whoever reads this from the restaurant, make sure to pass it along to him.

We‚Äôre already looking forward to coming back‚Äîand next time, we‚Äôre bringing friends. Highly recommend!

detailedReviews.author: Megan Woodruff
detailedReviews.text: Food is great! Service good. Would return for a third time :)

detailedReviews.author: cathy crawford
detailedReviews.text: Great food and service, and I'm from Italy!

detailedReviews.author: Robb Zelinski
detailedReviews.text: I'm probably going to travel back from the Atlanta area to Zionsville just so I can enjoy another meal at Convivio.

detailedReviews.author: Elias Herrera
detailedReviews.text: We go there often and the food is always amazing. The service is pretty good, highly recommended.

detailedReviews.author: Jason Roberts
detailedReviews.text: The best Italian food in Indy.  Get any of the homemade pasta dishes, especially the Nero. Highly recommended.

detailedReviews.author: Cecilia Hernandez
detailedReviews.text: The pasta is to die for. I dream of this dish. So delicious and spicy !

detailedReviews.author: Tara Wisniewski
detailedReviews.text: When visiting Zionsville this is our go to dinner.  I'm gluten free and many of the pasta dishes can be done gluten free.   The rest of my party really enjoyed the homemade specialty pasta.   Would definitely return the next time we are here in carmel.

detailedReviews.author: dalef good
detailedReviews.text: Food is always great but tonight‚Äôs experience was highlighted by the outstanding and delightful service by Gazmir. Thank you!

detailedReviews.author: Nontae Tun
detailedReviews.text: My partner and I come here to celebrate our special occasions and we love it everytime. Highly recommend the Nero!

detailedReviews.author: Tim Z.
detailedReviews.text: This is our go to anniversary spot. The food and service are amazing! Thank you!!

detailedReviews.author: Ligia Matousek
detailedReviews.text: Food is delicious! Always  good service from our Waiter. They make you feel special! Great ambiance as well!

detailedReviews.author: Calvin Close
detailedReviews.text: They make their pasta on premise. Great food and service

detailedReviews.author: Geoff Randolph
detailedReviews.text: Really great food and service was excellent. Great pace to the meal; smooth and not rushed.

detailedReviews.author: R
detailedReviews.text: Everything is amazing & no matter what you order you it will exceed your expectations.

detailedReviews.author: Jason Christenson
detailedReviews.text: Fantastic service and unbelievably tasty food. The owner came over and talked to us for a little bit about his restaurant and different dishes that he‚Äôs created. It was fantastic ambience, and not too loud, either. The setting is beautiful, and the food cannot be overstated! I really like the rigatoni. Five star for everything! I will be back and ordering this exact dish again!

detailedReviews.author: Nicole Bissonnette
detailedReviews.text: Great bar, excellent service. Maybe one of best Caesar Salads I have ever had. We ordered a dish that for us was too salty (I snack on salted anchovies, so that‚Äôs saying a lot). They immediately replaced the dish with another (Veal Saltimbocca) and we thoroughly enjoyed it.

detailedReviews.author: Bodhi Reese
detailedReviews.text: Top notch Italian!

detailedReviews.author: Ashlee Nemeth
detailedReviews.text: Food was delicious. I really enjoy the octopus, the arugula salad serves with it is really good. I had the mussels as my entr√©e.

detailedReviews.author: JP Hoffmann
detailedReviews.text: Great food, great service.

detailedReviews.author: Cindi McGarvey
detailedReviews.text: Love this restaurant. Only problem was they were out of salmon which was the reason we went there. Very accommodating with gluten allergies.

detailedReviews.author: norman zahn
detailedReviews.text: The place is extremely nice the help was extremely friendly the meal that I chose was okay I wish I would have tried something different

detailedReviews.author: Ryan Greenberg
detailedReviews.text: Wonderful food, great service.

detailedReviews.author: Jin Kim
detailedReviews.text:
Great Italian food, fresh and delicious ingredients, and very kind servers.
Will definitely come back again soon.

detailedReviews.author: Landon
detailedReviews.text: Called ahead to see if they could accommodate our party, they agreed.  Sat around the bar and got approached multiple times by their staff including the manager,  asking how long we'd be there and that if we sat at a table we'd have to leave in 30 minutes.  Very rude. Would never recommend this establishment.  Very disappointing. Got dagger eyes at us on our way out.

detailedReviews.author: Kevin DeJarnette
detailedReviews.text: Really good pasta! They make it in house and it's fantastic!

detailedReviews.author: Donna Clugh
detailedReviews.text: It was amazing from the moment we walked into the restaurant!

detailedReviews.author: Gerardo S√°nchez
detailedReviews.text: Pasta is always great at this place! I had the pasta with lamb and it was delicious! They have a very big selection of wines! And servers always have the best recommendations. For dessert had the chocolate cake and it was awesome!

detailedReviews.author: Aaron VanKampen
detailedReviews.text: Great food and a warm atmosphere!

detailedReviews.author: Kelly Jones
detailedReviews.text: Had an amazing meal with great service by Tim! All the staff were very helpful. We will definitely return. Great food and service!

detailedReviews.author: Weston Heeren
detailedReviews.text: Some of the best Italian food I ever had. Super fast service, great ambiance, not too loud, and not super filling either. I will be going back, but without kids as I did not notice a kids menu

detailedReviews.author: Howard
detailedReviews.text:
The food here has deteriorated badly. Veal marsala had lemon and capers in it. Total disaster.
Burata app was good.

detailedReviews.author: Joe Lynch
detailedReviews.text: Our server made our 1st experience amazing. The food is delicious. Very authentic.

detailedReviews.author: james hughes
detailedReviews.text: Incredible dinner service here last weekend, it was  our first time and most certainly will now be a regular spot for us. Bar tenders were amazing.

detailedReviews.author: Deborah Roach
detailedReviews.text: My god, everything tastes good here! Not one bad thing on the menu! Fantastic for date night...it has a warm, inviting, & lively atmosphere to it. Staff are friendly & knowledgeable...my only ding was it was a little loud near the bar [probably depends on who is at the bar & how much they've drank].

detailedReviews.author: Tim Doak
detailedReviews.text: The food got high marks from everyone at the table. It's a little different take on Italian food but we all very much enjoyed it. The service was very good but was slow to check in with the table. It was very loud but otherwise nicely decorated with unique art work.  We will be going back.

detailedReviews.author: rebecca cirone
detailedReviews.text: This place is FANTASTIC!! Coming from an Italian family, it‚Äôs nice having home made Italian food! We sat at the bar which I think we honestly prefer due to the fact that Corey and his co-mixologist were amazing!! They gave great recommendations and made us laugh! Thanks for a super enjoyable night!! The pasta was super freshly homemade and the cannolis were made from scratch that afternoon. I didn‚Äôt find a drink I liked on the menu so they concocted something that was probably the best drink I‚Äôve ever had.

detailedReviews.author: S McDowell
detailedReviews.text: Disappointed.  The ambience hectic even at 7:45pm.  Four of us dined-  all of us agreed- mediocre.  Caesar salad boring and charged extra for anchovies. Asked for sugar rim on a lemon drop and didn‚Äôt happen.   With today‚Äôs prices, this is a once and done.

detailedReviews.author: Jennifer Garry
detailedReviews.text: It's so so... you'll get a good meal but excellent, no.   Would I come back, also, no. Nothing was stellar, the gnocchi tasted liked pot roast in tomato sauce. I'm not sold on the home made pasta when it doesn't taste great.

detailedReviews.author: sara dilks
detailedReviews.text: Lovely meal out here, wine is super expensive though üòï

detailedReviews.author: Kim Andrew
detailedReviews.text: The way they bring your check to the table was so fun and something I had never seen before!

detailedReviews.author: Jillian Y
detailedReviews.text: Amazing food, stellar service!

detailedReviews.author: Jenn F
detailedReviews.text: Because I'm that person who orders steak at an Italian restaurant. The steak was not cooked quite as requested. The spinach was really salty. The potatoes are perfectly crispy and delicious.  The atmosphere was great.  The waitress seemed overwhelmed. We had to ask several times for drink refills.

detailedReviews.author: Brian McQueen
detailedReviews.text:
My daughter earned straight As on her report card and was able to select where we ate for dinner.  She selected Convivio - good choice.  I had been here one other time with a work event.  Then we had 16+ people, the crew did great, the atmosphere was great for a work event and all went smoothly.

This time, we were with just my family of 4.  And again, the crew did great, the atmosphere was great for a straight A celebration and all went smoothly.

Both times the food was cooked perfectly and the presentation was art work.  I want to go back to try more things!  Big group, small group - this is a fine place to be....

detailedReviews.author: Ken Clevenger
detailedReviews.text: Great Italian food with a section of menu that rotates based on different regions.  Not overly Americanized in style, one of the more authentic Italian places in Indianapolis area and well priced for high quality. Cocktails interesting and good.

detailedReviews.author: Scott Julian
detailedReviews.text: Overall our experience was really good. Our food was hit and miss. The Fritto Misto was more zucchini and fennel than calamari and shrimp. Tasted good but for $17, I wish it highlighted the calamari more. The Tagliatelle al Convivio and Nero both just okay. Not bad, but not great. The pizza was better than the pasta. Service was excellent!

detailedReviews.author: Felix Legions
detailedReviews.text: This restaurant has become rude and arrogant.  They behave like they are doing you a favor letting you eat there. Very off-putting.  There are better options.

detailedReviews.author: Rutledge Daugette
detailedReviews.text: Great restaurant in downtown Zionsville. Relaxed atmosphere with solid food options as well as wine and cocktails. Less cramped than the Carmel location, it felt like too. Highly recommend.

detailedReviews.author: Damar Gibson
detailedReviews.text: Food was absolutely amazing!! Top notch! Sophia was on point and a great waitress with great service. Would highly recommend this place and will definitely be back.

detailedReviews.author: Asit Patel
detailedReviews.text:
The menu is amazing!  The options for every step of the dining experience, from starters to main course were varied with something for everyone.  The cocktails and wine list was excellent and I love how they present it with a map of origin.  A great way to organize!
I enjoyed the ravioli and my partner loved her chicken dish!  I can see why so many of the menu items are favorites.
I will definitely come back to try more items.

detailedReviews.author: Ed Kapuscinski
detailedReviews.text: It was good Italian for the Midwest.

detailedReviews.author: Brian Badman
detailedReviews.text: Second time to this place.  Service was meh and food was same.  Not the best Italian food and definitely better in Indy.

detailedReviews.author: Megan
detailedReviews.text:
A very beautiful environment with friendly and helpful wait staff, but the food is just okay.

I came here with a group of friends. I ordered their lavender French 75 cocktail, which was pretty good. A little too lemony, but with hints of lavender, bergamot, and floral gin which were nice.

I also ordered the Pasta Roman, made with squid ink pasta, shrimp, and lobster. It was just okay. (Maybe I didn't look at the menu closely enough, but I expected it to come in an ink sauce. My mistake.) I felt like it was a pretty bland pasta in cream sauce with some seafood thrown on top. Nothing memorable.

I thought it was just me, at first. However, the consensus in our group was that our food was missing something. Everything lacked depth and punch, in my opinion. My friend described it as under-seasoned. I think that's a fair assessment.

Thanks for having us, but we won't return.

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers are genuinely thrilled with their experience. With an average 4.7/5 rating across 100 recent reviews, your restaurant consistently exceeds expectations.

strengthsPerceived: Customers rave about the freshly made Italian food, especially the in-house pasta dishes that taste like a warm hug. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The exceptional service provided by attentive and charming staff, such as Sam and Ms. Isabella, enhances the dining experience. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
The rotating menu that highlights different Italian regions keeps the dining experience fresh and exciting for regular patrons. - Boostly marketing services can amplify this
improvementOpportunities: Negative reviews and reputation issues regarding service and food quality - review management can address this concern
Lack of atmosphere/ambiance awareness and customer service issues - social media marketing can improve this area
Competition and discovery issues, with customers mentioning better options elsewhere - SEO services can solve this visibility issue
